verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward the children of Ammon,<WH1121> and prophesy against them:<WH5012>

and tell<WH559> the children of Ammon,<WH1121> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH136> Because you said,<WH559> Aha,<WH1889> against my sanctuary,<WH4720> when it was profaned;<WH2490> and against the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> when it was made desolate;<WH8074> and against the house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> when they went<WH1980> into captivity:<WH1473>

therefore,<WH5414> behold, I will deliver you to the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> for a possession,<WH4181> and they shall set<WH3427> their encampments<WH2918> in you,<WH5414> and make their dwellings<WH4908> in you;<WH398> they shall eat your fruit,<WH6529> and they shall drink<WH8354> your milk.<WH2461>

I will make<WH5414> Rabbah<WH7237> a stable<WH5116> for camels,<WH1581> and the children of Ammon<WH1121> a resting place<WH4769> for flocks:<WH6629> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Because you have clapped<WH4222> your hands,<WH3027> and stamped<WH7554> with the feet,<WH7272> and rejoiced<WH8055> with all the despite<WH7589> of your soul<WH5315> against the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478>

therefore,<WH5186> behold, I have stretched out my hand<WH3027> on you,<WH5414> and will deliver you for a spoil<WH957> to the nations;<WH1471> and I will cut you off<WH3772> from the peoples,<WH5971> and I will cause you to perish<WH6> out of the countries:<WH776> I will destroy<WH8045> you;<WH3045> and you shall know that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because<WH3282> Moab<WH4124> and Seir<WH8165> say,<WH559> Behold,<WH1004> the house of Judah<WH3063> is like all the nations;<WH1471>

therefore,<WH6605> behold, I will open the side<WH3802> of Moab<WH4124> from the cities,<WH5892> from his cities<WH5892> which are on his frontiers,<WH7097> the glory<WH6643> of the country,<WH776> Beth Jeshimoth,<WH1020> Baal Meon,<WH1186> and Kiriathaim,<WH7156>

to the children<WH1121> of the east,<WH6924> to go against the children of Ammon;<WH1121> and I will give<WH5414> them for a possession,<WH4181> that the children of Ammon<WH1121> may not be remembered<WH2142> among the nations.<WH1471>
and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on Moab;<WH4124> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because Edom<WH123> has dealt<WH6213> against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> by taking<WH5358> vengeance,<WH5359> and has greatly<WH816> offended,<WH816> and revenged himself on them;<WH5358>

therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> I will stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> on Edom,<WH123> and will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and animal<WH929> from it;<WH5414> and I will make it desolate<WH2723> from Teman;<WH8487> even to Dedan<WH1719> shall they fall<WH5307> by the sword.<WH2719>

I will lay<WH5414> my vengeance<WH5360> on Edom<WH123> by the hand<WH3027> of my people<WH5971> Israel;<WH3478> and they shall do<WH6213> in Edom<WH123> according to my anger<WH639> and according to my wrath;<WH2534> and they shall know<WH3045> my vengeance,<WH5360> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because the Philistines<WH6430> have dealt<WH6213> by revenge,<WH5360> and have taken<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359> with despite<WH7589> of soul<WH5315> to destroy<WH4889> with perpetual<WH5769> enmity;<WH342>

therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> Behold,<WH5186> I will stretch out my hand<WH3027> on the Philistines,<WH6430> and I will cut off<WH3772> the Cherethites,<WH3774> and destroy<WH6> the remnant<WH7611> of the sea<WH3220> coast.<WH2348>

I will execute<WH6213> great<WH1419> vengeance<WH5360> on them with wrathful<WH2534> rebukes;<WH8433> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I shall lay<WH5414> my vengeance on them.<WH5360>
